sections.title: Project Context and Goals
sections.goal: Understand the overall objectives, constraints, and stakeholder landscape for Nimbus Observability.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the main goals for Nimbus Observability in the current build phase?
What regulatory or compliance constraints influence your observability design?
Who are your primary stakeholders and how do their priorities differ?

sections.title: Current Architecture and Tooling
sections.goal: Explore the existing telemetry pipelines, SLO definitions, and integration points.
sample_questions: Which components of the OpenTelemetry pipeline are already implemented?
How do you currently define and track SLOs within the platform?
Can you describe how incident analytics are integrated into the broader Novereon ecosystem?

sections.title: Operational Challenges and Runbooks
sections.goal: Identify recurring operational pain points and the role of runbooks like RB-OBS-033.
sample_questions: What kinds of incidents are most common in the current environment?
How does RB-OBS-033 help mitigate alert fatigue in practice?
Are there any unwritten heuristics your team follows during on-call that aren't captured in runbooks?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Understand how Nimbus Observability links to other projects’ telemetry, such as Helios Datalake or Orion Edge Gateway.
sample_questions: Where does Nimbus consume or provide telemetry to other Novereon projects?
Have you encountered issues when correlating data across services like Helios Datalake and Orion Edge Gateway?
How do you manage versioning or schema changes in shared observability data?

sections.title: Decision Points and Risk Management
sections.goal: Discuss major architectural or operational decisions, trade-offs, and documented risk mitigation.
sample_questions: What was the most challenging decision you faced during the design of the sampling strategy (RFC-1114)?
How do you balance cost of telemetry with the need for detailed incident analytics?
Can you share any risk assessments or tickets that influenced recent design changes?

sections.title: Future Roadmap and UX Considerations
sections.goal: Elicit ideas for improving the usability of observability tools for diverse user roles.
sample_questions: Looking ahead, what features would most improve your day-to-day use of observability tools?
How do you envision non-SRE stakeholders interacting with Nimbus dashboards?
Are there specific UX pain points you’d like addressed in upcoming iterations?
